key.name: portals-restore-token
key.description: Token used to restore remote desktop sessions without requiring user re-authorization.

key.name: default-language
key.description: ISO 639-1 code for the default language used for speech recognition and text processing.

key.name: secondary-language
key.description: ISO 639-1 code for the secondary language. Use left Shift for primary and right Shift for secondary language.

key.name: cloud-enabled
key.description: Enable cloud-based providers for voice and text models.

key.name: anthropic-api-key
key.description: Optional API key for Anthropic Claude models. When empty, Anthropic models will not be available.

key.name: google-api-key
key.description: Optional API key for Google models. When empty, Google models will not be available.

key.name: openai-api-key
key.description: Optional API key for OpenAI models. When empty, OpenAI models will not be available.

key.name: text-processing-enabled
key.description: Enable LLM-based text processing to polish transcriptions.

key.name: google-model-name
key.description: Optional model name for Google requests. When empty, uses the app default.

key.name: google-base-url
key.description: Optional custom base URL for Google. When empty, uses the standard Google endpoint.

key.name: google-text-use-api-key
key.summary: Use Google API key for text models
key.description: Enable using the Google API key for text model requests. Disabled by default.

key.name: anthropic-model-name
key.description: Optional model name for Anthropic requests. When empty, uses the app default.

key.name: anthropic-base-url
key.description: Optional custom base URL for Anthropic. When empty, uses the standard Anthropic endpoint.

key.name: anthropic-text-use-api-key
key.summary: Use Anthropic API key for text models
key.description: Enable using the Anthropic API key for text model requests. Disabled by default.

key.name: openai-model-name
key.description: Optional model name for OpenAI requests. When empty, uses the app default.

key.name: openai-base-url
key.description: Optional custom base URL for OpenAI. When empty, uses the standard OpenAI endpoint.

key.name: openai-text-use-api-key
key.summary: Use OpenAI API key for text models
key.description: Enable using the OpenAI API key for text model requests. Disabled by default.

key.name: custom-context
key.description: Optionally share details like job, location, or writing style to help improve transcriptions.

key.name: custom-vocabulary
key.description: Optionally add words, names, technical terms, or acronyms the model should recognize.
